name: Rencontre in-game [VR]
description:
Rencontre in-game is a short VR journey in a wierd and colorful blend of 3D scanned environnement. Featuring various arcades (The Archives, Burlington, VT), my father's cabin and some pink flamingos.

The soundtrack was made by the excellent Gabriel Ledoux 
This project VR project made during an artist residency at Villa Verticale.

Please leave a comment if you tried it, I'd love to hear your feedback.
